/opt/rocm/llvm/bin/clang++ -O3 -DNDEBUG  -lgfortran CMakeFiles/tensoradd_cfun.dir/tensoradd_cfun.f90.o CMakeFiles/tensoradd_cfun.dir/tensor_lib_c.f90.o CMakeFiles/tensoradd_cfun.dir/c_functions.cpp.o -o tensoradd_cfun  -Wl,-rpath,/opt/rocm/lib: /opt/rocm/lib/libamdhip64.so.5.7.50703 --hip-link /opt/rocm-5.7.3/llvm/lib/clang/17.0.0/lib/linux/libclang_rt.builtins-x86_64.a
